war

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • war.Card
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Card>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JCard

    public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Card>
    Assignment #10
    Represents a playing card that is comparable to other cards. A card is considered greater than another card if it's rank is greater than the other.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Card.Suit
      Represents a playing card's suit.
